patthana18.16:1.1: Sāsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.16:2.1: Anāsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.16:3.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate cattāri. (Lokiyadukasadisaṃ.)
